login-hello.introduction:
Welcome to the private server Love Live! School Idol Festival!
In order to avoid the blocking of our server we ask you not to post screenshots, video and other content from this server to any open source.
Thank you!

login-login.ifYouLostLoginDataContactUs: If you forgot your account password, you can send us a change password request to regain access to your account
login-login.userIdShouldBeInt: Value "User ID" must be an integer
login-login.successDescriptionLogin:
Login Successfull!
Close this window to proceed.
login-login.invalidLoginOrPass: User ID or Password is invalid
login-login.mailSendingError: An error has occurred while sending your message, please try again later or contact the administrator
login-login.passwordResetSuccess: New password was sent to E-Mail specified
login-login.mailSuccess: A letter with verfication code was send to E-Mail specified
login-login.confirmationCodeNotExists: Verification code is outdated, receive a new one from previous form
login-login.invalidUserIdOrMail: User ID or E-Mail is invalid

login-startup.nicknameIncorrect: Username must contain from 0 to 18 alphanumeric characters
login-startup.mailIncorrect: This E-Mail is invalid. Please check the E-Mail specified and try again
login-startup.passwordIncorrect: Password must have from 1 to 32 Latin characters and numbers
login-startup.passwordsNotMatch: Password and confirmation password do not match
login-startup.checkMail:
Check your E-Mail to proceed.
If it is not present please check your spam folder.
login-startup.successDescription:
Account #{{userId}} is succeed! Keep this number to successful login.
{{checkMail}}Close this window to proceed.

settings-index.handoverNotice:
Handover ID — это пароль от вашего аккаунта.
Никому его не сообщайте, а в случае компроментации, измените.

bulkCardDeletion.title: Массовое удаление карт
bulkCardDeletion.description: С помощью этой функции Вы можете удалить за один раз карты, которые не состоят в командах, не выбраны в качестве партнёра и не помечены замочком.
bulkCardDeletion.enterYourPasswordToConfirm: Введите пароль/Handover ID для подтверждения действия.
bulkCardDeletion.delayNotice: Выполнение запроса может занять до двух минут.

maintenance.title: Maintenance
maintenance.notice: The server is currently undergoing maitenance
maintenance.periodCanBeChanged: Please note that maintenance time may vary slightly and changed without prior notice
maintenance.apologize: We apologize for any inconveniences and thank you for your patience.

update.title: Update required
update.notice: Please update to the latest version of the application to use all the newest features.
update.youCanDownloadANewVersionBellow: You can download a new version of the application from the links below:
update.loginIntoYourAccountToDownload: To download the newest verison log in to your account.

banned.title: Your account is banned
banned.notice: Your account is banned for violation of our private server rules.
banned.temporaryBanned: This ban is temporary and the access will be regained in {{time}}

tooManyCards.title: Your Member List is full!
tooManyCards.content:
The amount of cards in your inventory exceeded 10 thousand.
You may have problems with login in due to the exceeded Member List.
To fix this objectionable problem you may use
the remove member tab

welcome.subject: Welcome!
welcome.body:
Hello, {{userName}}!

You received this message since your E-Mail adress was specified in our private server for Love Live! School Idol Festival.

From now on this E-Mail adress will be used to notify you about all the actions related to your account.

passwordChange.subject: Change Password
passwordChange.body:
Hello, {{userName}}!

the password of your account in our server has been changed.

If it was made not by you you should immediately contact the administrator.
{{supportMail}}

passwordRecovery.subject: Recover password
passwordRecovery.verifyCode:
Hello, {{userName}}!

You received this message since you made a password recovery request for your account.
If it was not made by you IGNORE and DELETE this message.
Your password will not change until you input the code shown below.

If you received several messages about password recovery you should input only the newest verification code.

To recover your password input this verification code: {{code}}
This code is valid only for 10 minutes({{sendTime}})

Sender's IP-adress {{ip}}

mailChange.subject: Change E-Mail
mailChange.body:
Hello, {{userName}}!

the E-Mail adress of your account in our server has been changed.

If it was made not by you you should immediately contact the administrator.
{{supportMail}}
